name: Plastic Product #1
shortDescription: High-quality transparent plastic component manufactured with precision engineering for durability and clarity.
description: At JCV Precision Manufacturing, producing flawless transparent plastic parts requires specialized expertise and infrastructure.
features: Mirror-Polished Cavities: Eliminates flow marks or haze.
Optimized Venting & Cooling: Prevents gas traps and cloudiness.
Optical-Grade Material Handling: Hygroscopic resins dried at ≤0.02% humidity.
Automated Machines: ±0.03mm repeatability with fine temperature control.

name: Plastic Product #2
shortDescription: Durable custom plastic part designed for industrial applications with clarity and precision.
description: Our second product offers optimized performance and premium transparency for demanding applications.
features: Anti-Scratch Surface: Maintains clarity under stress.
Automated Quality Checks: Ensures defect-free output.
